Parameter Detail

degree

Ring degree. Each node is connected to "degree" succcessors and "degree" predecessors.

msgsize

Message size. A message contains "msgsize" nodes. Defaults to "degree"*2.

tabu

Tabu list size. The tabu list is used when selecting a node, to avoid to visit too early a node that has been visited recently.

psi

PSI

capacity

Initial capacity of the cache. Defaults to "degree". Each time the capacity is exhausted, the size is doubled.
